name: Esperé's Journey
description:
Following a mass genocide of monsters, the remaining population of monsters lived either as slaves above ground--compromising the lowest caste of Human society--or as a dwindling remnant of their former glory underground. Humans reign supreme and constantly keep the monsters controlled in order to keep their power.

Now, you play as Esperé, a monster waking up in the Sewer landscape with no recollection. Ultimately, she must find the truth behind the strange mysterious infection that horribly corrupts monsters.

------ Controls ------

Control_______(Keyboard/Mouse) [Gamepad]

Move__________(WASD) [Left Stick]

Attack__________(Left Click) [West Face Button]

Dash____________(Space) [South Face Button]

Heal____________(E)
